titles.title: American Innovation Act
American Innovation Act
To prioritize funding for an expanded and sustained national investment in basic science research.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, and in addition to the Committees on Armed Services, and the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
